results.t: Blogger.com - Create a unique and beautiful blog easily.
results.p: Choose the perfect design. Create a beautiful blog that fits your style. · Get a domain. Give your blog the perfect home. · Earn money. Get paid for your hard ...
Weblog publishing tool from Google, for sharing text, photos and video.
Blogger is an American online content management system founded in 1999 which enables its users to write blogs with time-stamped entries.
Create a blog, add pages to your blog, create, edit, manage, or delete a post, add images & videos to your blog, manage your comments.
A blogger is someone who writes regularly for an online journal or website. A political blogger might provide weekly commentary on current events.

results.t: BLOGGER | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary
results.p: someone who writes a blog (= a regular record of someone's ideas, opinions, or experiences that is put on the internet for other people to read)
Browse help topics, get started with Blogger, create a blog, add pages to your blog, create, edit, manage, or delete a post, add images & videos to your blog.
